name: CAL_COMM_TRACKING
description: The CAL_COMM_TRACKING table contains information about your communication tracking records. This includes such information as communication type, the date and time the contact was made, and caller details.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the Communication Tracking record.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user who entered the communication.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: COMM_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time of the communication, stored in UTC format.

columns.name: COMM_COMMENT
columns.description: A comment to go with the communication.

columns.name: CALLER_NAME
columns.description: For incoming calls, this item stores the name of the caller.  For outgoing calls, it stores the name of the person who was contacted for this logged communication.

columns.name: PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: Phone number for the communication.

columns.name: CONTACT_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account that is associated with the communication.

columns.name: REF_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: If there is a scanned document related to the communication, this field will contain the ID of the document's DCS record.

columns.name: COMM_CMT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Note record containing comment about communication

columns.name: CONTACT_PHR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pharmacy that is associated with the communication.

columns.name: CONTACT_PHR_ID_PHARMACY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the pharmacy.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the external identifier for this contact. This may be populated when the contact was automatically generated.

columns.name: COMM_IN_CMT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note that is associated with the lab comment.

columns.name: CONTACT_WORKER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hospital service employee that is associated with this communication.

columns.name: CONTACT_WORKER_PAGER_C_NAME
columns.description: The pager this communication was sent to.

columns.name: MESSAGE_SUBJECT
columns.description: The subject line of a message sent to a pager.

columns.name: MESSAGE_AD_HOC_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the message was ad hoc (entered by a user in Hyperspace) rather than a system-generated message triggered by some kind of action.

columns.name: TC_REQ_COMM_CONTACT_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: This item stores the identifier for the entry in the contact log of the associated Transfer Center request that corresponds with the contact on the communication.

columns.name: CONTACT_SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the laboratory submitter that is associated with the communication.

columns.name: CONTACT_SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: SOURCE_COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the communication record that this communication was copied from when it was moved to a different transfer center request.

columns.name: CONTACT_REP_GUID
columns.description: This is the line identifier for the representative of the member being contacted as part of this communication. The line identifier corresponds to the coverage responsible person line identifier (MEMBER_RESP_PERSON.MEM_RESP_GUID).

columns.name: MESSAGE_PREFERRED_LANGUAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: The preferred language of the message recipient, if not the native language for the environment.
